name: User registration & user profile â€“ UserPlus
author: userplus

sections.description:
Get Pro Feature

  • http://wpuserplus.com

UserPlus is a full featured front-end profile, login and registration plugin for WordPress. It is user-friendly and customizable. With this plugin you can stop sending your users to the ugly back-end profile, registration and login pages, and instead give your users a seamless front-end experience on pages that match the rest of your website

Features

  • Login : Login with Username or Email Id
  • Registration
  • Forgot Password
  • View Profile
  • Edit Profile
  • Custom Profile Fields:
    • Unlimited custom fields for profiles and/or registration (text, drop-down, radio, checkboxes, etc.)
    • Create dynamic lists for checkboxes, dropdowns, radio buttons
    • Support file uploads forany file type
    • Many pre-defined fields ready to use
    • Set Privacy for field
    • Create dynamic lists for checkboxes, dropdowns, radio buttons
    • Create required fields.
    • You can add Fontawesome Icon for each field
    • Set Maximum Length for field
    • Set Minimum Length for field
  • Admin Panel:
    • Custom fields may be added to profiles, registration forms
    • Admin panel with profile customizer for creating and organizing fields
    • Support file uploads forany file type
    • Many pre-defined fields ready to use
    • Set Privacy for field
    • Create dynamic lists for checkboxes, dropdowns, radio buttons
    • Create required fields.
    • You can add Fontawesome Icon for each field
    • Set Maximum Length for field
    • Set Minimum Length for field
  • Email Notification
    • New Registration
    • Password Reset Email
    • Awaiting Admin Approval
    • Verify Email
  • Auto Generate page for Login,Register
  • AJAX based verification for username and email accounts
  • Add smooth ajax login/registration effects
  • Light weight plugin
  • Responsive
  • MultiSite

    • Get Pro Feature

    • http://wpuserplus.com

    Front-end profile, login and registration plugin for WordPress.

    • Front end profile
    • Ultimate Login & Registration form with shortcode
    • Custom form fields
    • Password strength meter and support for forcing password strength level
    • Social Login/Register
    • Sidebar Login Widget/Shortcode
    • Automatically works with Gravatar, or users may upload custom profile pictures and avatars
    • Ability to delete profiles after confirmation by user.
    • Ultimate Memberlist.
    • Create required fields.
    • Allow other user profile ediitng capabilities for non-admin users.
    • Import/Export custom fields.
    • Import Users from Csv
    • Customize registration email for users.
    • Customize registration email for admins.
    • Customize user activation email for users.
    • Customize user activation email for admins.
    • Registration admin approve.
    • Registration Email activation.
    • Login Redirection
    • Register Redirection.
    • New features added regularly!
    • Support

    Translations

    • English

    Official Site
sections.installation:
1. Download the plugin file, unzip and place it in your wp-content/plugins/ folder. You can alternatively upload it via the WordPress plugin backend.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. UserPlus menu will appear in Dashboard->UserPlus.
  4. After installing plugin.login,registration and profile page will be automatically create on your site.
sections.faq:
Q.want more feature?
If you want more feature then
Drop Mail :wpuserplus@gmail.com

Installation Instructions

  1. Download the plugin file, unzip and place it in your wp-content/plugins/ folder. You can alternatively upload it via the WordPress plugin backend.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. UserPlus menu will appear in Dashboard->UserPlus.
  4. After installing plugin.login,registration and profile page will be automatically create on your site.
